short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select JIRA attachments form a ticket and download them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download all attachments of any JIRA ticket with one click.

The Popup allows choosing which attachment should be downloaded. The found attachments can be search also using regular expressions and a additional link filter can be defined to find external, linked attachments. The setting for this filter is persisted per domain. The attachments are saved into the default download folder as <JIRA project>/<JIRA ticket id>/<filename> or another pattern which can be setup in the attachment options.
